item.description:
只有戴口罩才可以做的支线任务 本帖最后由 大飞哥 于 2020-2-8 14:19 编辑
前几天学校给所有学生发邮件，提醒大家注意防护等等，然而最后写了一行字:
Please be aware that the wearing of surgical or face masks in public spaces does not indicate the person in question is ill or infected with the Coronavirus (or any other illness). Many people wear these masks as a precaution against themselves getting ill.
“戴口罩不意味着生病”，这也需要提醒的？学校真是多虑了。
然而今天我看到这样一条新闻。

大飞哥:
只有戴口罩才可以做的支线任务
本帖最后由 大飞哥 于 2020-2-8 14:19 编辑
前几天学校给所有学生发邮件，提醒大家注意防护等等，然而最后写了一行字:
Please be aware that the wearing of surgical or face masks in public spaces does not indicate the person in question is ill or infected with the Coronavirus (or any other illness). Many people wear these masks as a precaution against themselves getting ill.
“戴口罩不意味着生病”，这也需要提醒的？学校真是多虑了。
然而今天我看到这样一条新闻。

leghorn00:
a medical mask is not required, as no evidence is available on its usefulness to protect non-sick persons. However, masks might be worn in some countries according to local cultural habits. If masks are used, best practices should be followed on how to wear, remove, and dispose of them and on hand hygiene action after removal (see below advice regarding appropriate mask management).
所以世卫组织在口罩指南里专门写了这么一句。
